content: this bold eye-catching accessory is not only a pleasure to wear but a super simple knit as well with alternating bands of color you can make your hats in a classic combination or choose a more vibrant pairing of colors that is completely your own with 3 stripe styles to choose from you can get the most out of just 3 skeins of yarn **kits coming to the shop soon ** **finished measurements** approx 16 18 23 / 40 46 58 cm circumference x 11-11 5 / 28 cm tall **gauge** 22 sts x 29 rnds = 4 / 10 cm in st st on larger needle **needles** *needle listed is suggested always take time to swatch * us 7 4 5 mm 16 / 40 cm circular circ needle double pointed needles dpns or size necessary to obtain gauge us 5 3 75 mm 16 / 40 cm circ needle **yarn** worsted weight yarn in the following yardages to make all 3 hat options* c1 approx 200 yds / 183 m c2 approx 200 yds / 183 m c3 approx 200 yds / 183 m *if you would like to make a pom pom for each hat this will require extra yarn you should have enough left from each skein to make these sample featured in plucky knitter scholar worsted 3 0 75% merino 25% cashmere 300 yards / 274 m per 115 g colors used clockwise from left as shown in the photos on this page technicolor teal c1 / bar cheese c2 / chocolate crinkle c3 chocolate crinkle c1 / technicolor teal c2 / bar cheese c3 bar cheese c1 / technicolor teal c2 / chocolate crinkle c3 additional samples shown in before you go-go/ twill/ bar cheese technicolor teal/ high cotton/ best in bloom other recommended plucky knitter bases legacy worsted /yarns/library/the-plucky-knitter-legacy-worsted primo worsted /yarns/library/the-plucky-knitter-primo-worsted **tools** pom pom maker if desired marker tapestry needle
